pr_title: New ReadWriteSafeCache. Rewrite the whole Window and Collection. Simplify codes

timeline.message: Rewrite the whole window and collection to new ReadWriteSafeCache.

timeline.bodyText: Seems buffer1 and buffer2 are redundant
timeline.author: kezhenxu94
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,78 @@

+package org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.core.analysis.data;
+
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
+
+/**
+ * ReadWriteSafeCache provides a read/write isolated cache.
+ */
+public class ReadWriteSafeCache<T> {
+    /**
+     * The buffer1 is used for read or write.
+     */
+    private BufferedData<T> buffer1;
+    /**
+     * The buffer2 is used for read or write.
+     */
+    private BufferedData<T> buffer2;

replies.bodyText: Yes, I forgot to remove those from legacy codes. Have been removed now.
replies.author: wu-sheng

timeline.message: Merge branch 'window-rewrite' of https://github.com/apache/skywalking into window-rewrite
